research_municipality_step.notes: The elected officials for Evant, Texas were identified from the official City of Evant website and the Texas Municipal League City Officials Directory. Charles Weeks is the Mayor, with a term from May 2025 to May 2027. Brian Mauney serves as Mayor Pro Tem and a Council Member. Other identified Council Members include Joy Witty, Vernon McCann, Michelle Marwitz, Barney L. Knight, and Coy Latham.
